headline: Why Investors Found Kroger Stock so Tasty Today
summary: This closely followed a better-than-expected quarterly earnings report.  Cruising on momentum from a well-received earnings report, Kroger (NYSE: KR) stock pushed nearly 3% higher on Monday.  Much of this lift came from a clutch of price targets from analysts following the stock.

headline: Kroger CEO sounds alarm on unexpected customer behavior
summary: The grocery chain has noticed that shoppers are switching gears.

headline: Grocery giant Kroger to close 60 stores in next 18 months
summary: Kroger plans to close 60 stores over the next 18 months. Affected employees will be offered positions at other locations, the grocer said.

raw.headline: Grocery giant Kroger to close 60 stores in next 18 months
raw.summary: Kroger plans to close 60 stores over the next 18 months. Affected employees will be offered positions at other locations, the grocer said.

headline: C&S Wholesale Grocers to Acquire SpartanNash in $1.77B Deal
summary: C&S Wholesale Grocers agreed to buy  SpartanNash  for around $1.77 billion, including debt, bolstering its food distribution network and adding 200 grocery stores after a prior deal to beef up its business collapsed.  To alleviate antitrust concerns, C&S agreed to buy 579 stores.  C&S, which supplies products to retailers across the country and also owns 160 stores including Piggly Wiggly and Grand Union, is now turning to another company to grow its operations.

summary: Kroger raises guidance, highlights e-commerce growth & cost cuts. Digital sales surge 15% YoY. Find out why I upgraded my rating on KR stock to Buy from Hold.

headline: Kroger is closing around 60 stores in the next year and a half
summary: Kroger is set to close about 5% of its grocery stores — amounting to approximately 60 locations — over the next year and a half.

headline: Kroger reports plan to close 60 grocery stores by end of 2026
summary: Kroger posted total sales of $45.1bn in Q1 2025, a marginal decline from $45.3bn in the same period of the previous year.
